website_summaries.verdict: A traditional futon mattress designed to fit and function like an original Japanese model.
pros: Authentic Japanese workmanship, durable styling, and comfortable material
cons: Some owners say it lacks thickness for use on the floor
Doesn't come with a cover, but a mattress and cover set is available for a higher price

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money
customer_reviews.text: Not 3 inches tall as described. I'm from Japan and slept on numerous futon. This product is poorly made and not thick or stable like other Japanese futon I've ever slept on. Not worth the money. I specifically paid extra for JAPANESE futon, not others made in different countries that almost feel like a thicker sleeping bag...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this matress for about two months now and I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. It never reached the advertised 3 inches and it has deflated down to 1 inch and nothing makes it fluff back up. I've put it out in the sun several different times, I've propped it up on some chairs with a fan underneath, I fold it up every day but still nothing helps. I never would have spent that much money on this mattress if I knew it would only last just past the return period.
customer_reviews.author: Wisteria Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Sadly, very, very disappointed and disgusted
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum sealed bag is NOT as pictured and arrived torn. It was stuffed in a reusable vacuum seal bag you can get at home Depot. I decided to open it anyways hoping that it just happened during shipping. I opened it up and was offset by the yellowing trim edges. As if it were old but, I figured maybe it's just the color difference of different materials. Then, I barely even unfolded it to find hairs and different colored lint. Which leaves me thinking this must have been a returned item. I didn't even completely unfold it because I was so disappointed. Also, because the vacuum sealed bag is torn, I can't even return it!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Tiongson

customer_reviews.title: Used item sold as new
customer_reviews.text: The item I received is extremely dirty. I'm assuming it was used. The attached photo is one of many stains.
customer_reviews.author: anon.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Being that my wife is from Okinawa, I was very eager to try out one of these shikibutons rather than buy a new, $1,000+ bed. I noticed on some of the other reviews for similar products sold by EMOOR that buyers noted a difference in thickness of the futon as compared to the advertised size of 3". This futon, however, was a nice 3" thick and very sturdy and comfortable. It is very large, being a queen size, as I am used to sleeping on a traditional full-size mattress. To get an idea of the size, I had my 3 year old son lay on it for the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: and much worse back pain
customer_reviews.text: Somehow the photos demonstrating that this product is not the thickness it advertising was not enough to dissuade me. I believe this product is in no way reflective of a traditional shikibuton. Typically, a shikibuton acts as a mattress and lifts and supports and individual off of the floor. This product is nothing more than an extremely expensive cotton comforter. So, imagine sleeping on the floor, or a wooden platform, with only a comforter. Does that somehow help your low back pain? Nope. But it certainly gives you rib, neck, shoulder, knee, and much worse back pain! I don’t see any real shikibuton on Amazon, but this thing is a useless piece of garbage that will cause you endless pain.
customer_reviews.author: datalikeme

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: So far, after following all the instructions, there are still extreme wrinkles (behind which would be a natural amount) and strong fold marks all over the futon. It looks as if its used or old, its very underwelming. I already let it expand out of the vacuum sealed bag for over 12 hours and i've properly dried each side of the futon in the sun for the appropriate amount of time as indicated on the instructions. This means the product is just either faulty or low quality, i would recomend being careful when purchasing this product.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: This futon is fairly thin and looks like it would be hell to sleep on
customer_reviews.text: Okay, in all honesty, I was very skeptical. This futon is fairly thin and looks like it would be hell to sleep on. I have slept on it now for two or three weeks and I find it to be along the lines of an orthopedic bed. It's firm but in a very good way. I love it and I'm extremely happy that I bought it!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Brown

customer_reviews.title: my husband and baby love it as well
customer_reviews.text: I been doing a lot of research, from Walmart, target, sears etc to some online store such as J-lifeinternational, thefutonshop, Oriental Furniture, White Lotus Home etc. I looking for quality stuff and the price I paid match with the value (not overpriced). I think I did a very precise decision, my husband and baby love it as well. Additionally, I don't feel painful on my spine while I sleep on it on carpet floor.
customer_reviews.author: Ml

customer_reviews.title: Super firm - side sleepers should avoid unless additional cushioning is used
customer_reviews.text: The construction of the futon mattress is excellent and I had no issues with the packing and delivery. However, after using the futon for approx. six weeks I've determined it is not usable for me without a mattress topper or additional cushioning. I'm 5'5 and weigh approx. 155 lbs and sleeping on the futon is only slightly better than sleeping on a comforter. If I was primarily a back sleeper I could possibly deal with it but I'm a side sleeper at times. I would strongly recommend that anyone purchasing this futon understand that when they mean "firm" they really mean firm.
customer_reviews.author: John Lee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant after reading some of the other reviews but got my mattress and tatami mat yesterday. It puffed up to its advertised 3 inches within minutes of taking it out of the vacuum packaging. The cover and mat are flawless, without stains or defects. It is very comfortable if you are looking for a real futon sleeping experience (extra-firm). Excellent quality, exactly as advertised. I've now slept on this mattress and tatami mat for several weeks and I can say that it continues to provide a very comfortable sleeping experience and much more comfortable than any convertible that I've ever slept on.
customer_reviews.author: Zatoichi

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with the thickness!!
customer_reviews.text: Over all I am a disappointed!! This is way too thin!! U can feel the floor when you sleep on it!! It looks beautiful white but the thickness is nothing like what is shown in the seller's picture. Not worth my money!! I bought a king size, if I fold it into half it seems to meet the thickness requirement. If it was double its current thickness I would have been happy. It says it has three layers within but feels like single layer. I waited an entire week and exposed it to enough sunlight every day but no improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Siddharth

customer_reviews.title: Better than a $1000+ mattress
customer_reviews.text: My sister and I both bought new beds at around the same time. She spent over a thousand on a new mattress that she asserted was extremely comfortable. She wondered why I would buy a Japanese futon of all things to replace my old king-size bed. She decided to try it out, and said it was the best thing she ever laid on and fell asleep on it. She's now looking for her own futon/tatami set to replace her bed with. Originally, I planned to replace my bed with this futon set to make more room for VR, but after sleeping on it for almost 8 months, I'm glad I bought it regardless of the extra VR space.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan S.

customer_reviews.title: A blessing in disguise
customer_reviews.text: For someone who plans on moving around, this is definitely a great alternative to a big mattress. I am a small person, so carrying this around my apartment was easy! The mattress is firm but incredibly comfortable... with a catch. I am currently using this futon mattress on an IKEA slatted bed frame and I could definitely feel the slats. I folded up the mattress to double up on layers (I basically fit on this new configuration because I am short), and it is super comfortable. So basically this is comfortable but thin so definitely double up if you plan on using on a slatted frame.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the queen long, and received the regular queen length. The part that bothered me the most is that it is supposed to be 2.5in thick and this was maybe 1.5in thick. It never really uncompressed. And it felt like a thick sleeping bag. There seems to be a lot of mixed reviews where people have the item as described and everything is perfect. And another set of reviews that end up like mine. I wonder if there are two different products being sent. Either way it was easy to return and I got my money back. So no hard feelings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simple, Comfortable and portable.
customer_reviews.text: Decided my mattress was giving me back aches and got this to replace it. It was surprisingly comfortable for its thickness and I have been sleeping on it since. It folds well, and easy to put away so it saves a lot of space. You can also use a regular bed sheet to cover it, I recommend a comforter cover. Everything was great, except shipment, it took like 3 weeks even though it was prime.
customer_reviews.author: David Chen

customer_reviews.title: Just to be clear for American buyers - "Japanese" full ...
customer_reviews.text: Just to be clear for American buyers - "Japanese" full size is about 6 inches longer than American full size. The product dimensions clearly state this, but be advised! Check that the futon cover you buy will fit, etc.
customer_reviews.author: whats_in_a_name

customer_reviews.title: Sace your money buy the Queen for $5 more
customer_reviews.text: This "Mattress" shikibuton is really the mattress pad you purchase for the Emoor full shikibuton. For 5 dollars more you can purchase the actual queen MATRESS from Emoor instead of this futon pad. Upon further research into the matter I will be purchasing the queen and giving this one to my children. For a pad it is pretty comfy.
customer_reviews.author: E. M. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: manufactured in Japan so a very good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were hoping for; manufactured in Japan so a very good quality product. As is Japanese custom, we paired the futons with underlying sleeping pads and use them for guest beds. We had been using the large Costco inflatable mattresses but after two got irreparable holes and had to be thrown away, we felt there had to be a better, more environmentally-friendly way to own portable, removable, yet comfortable guest beds. These are perfect and would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MJP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and really a neat thing to have
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and really a neat thing to have. Everyone who tries it loves it. Came with a sheet. I’ve seen some reviewers state it was no thick enough but I find it to be perfect. It’s a futon mattress after all. It arrives compressed in a bag. Once you take it out it fluffs up just fine. It is VERY comfortable for sleeping on the floor. I’ve tried it and also guests love it.
customer_reviews.author: GeoMan

customer_reviews.title: Not 3" thick
customer_reviews.text: When I opened it, I thought "they've sent me a mattress pad!". It was nicely vacuum packed, but didn't expand to 3" thick! I was expecting a traditional Japanese kakebuton - the kind I use at grandma's house in Japan - but this is a thin, lightweight mat that we'd normally put on top of a ticker base futon. We had to place it on a foam bed pad to make it comfortable enough to sleep on. Note that the manufacturer claims this futon is 39 x 83 x 3 in. (100 x 210 x 8 cm) but it's 2" thick - see the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: BETTER THAN ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: I am afraid to say that after 3 months there remains the problem of not wanting to leave the futon in the morning. Because I had a piece of 1" foam laying about I used that under the futon as I had seen some other reviewers referring to that benefit. I really don't know if it makes a difference as I did not test out the non-foam layer experience., Again, the hard part is not looking for an unneeded nap opportunity. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martin

customer_reviews.title: Read the specs and instructions.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable mattress I have ever owned. Read the instructions: air it out on a sunny day and it WILL expand to the manufacturers described specifications. It is a futon, not a western mattress. I see the negative reviews and cannot help but think that the consumers did not know what exactly they were purchasing. It is very comfortable. I place it on top of a tatami mat and it is more than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable Futon
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in a vacuum-sealed bag. I opened it up and let it sit overnight to expand, and it was ready to use by the next day. A little wider than expected, which is fine. No unusual odors, bugs, marks, etc. Mine is laid atop a foam exercise mat, maybe 1/2” thick, with hardwood floor beneath that. I find this to be a very comfortable futon, much better than the memory foam mattress I was using previously. Great if you enjoy sleeping on a mostly firm surface, and certainly better for back support. It also folds back up easily for transport. Very light, so one person can move it around without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: In my search for an alternative to traditional mattresses (something that would be much easier to transport when the time comes to move again), I stumbled across Japanese futons. After reading up on them some more, I decided to take the dive and give it a go. I was pleasantly surprised! I prefer firmer mattresses, so sleeping on the floor with this one turned out to be a perfect fit for me. Please, it was much easier to bring this in and set it up than a traditional boxspring mattress would've been.
customer_reviews.author: Ajay

customer_reviews.title: Legit Made In Japan Futon
customer_reviews.text: This a genuine made in Japan futon, or shikibuton. No this isn’t the softest thickest futon you can buy, but it is actually hard to find made in Japan futons for this price in the United States. For the price I think it is terrific. Obviously it’s not going to be as thick as a mattress. If you want mattress thickness then buy a mattress. Also keep in mind that Japanese futons are designed to be used on a soft surface like tatami (carpet works too), so you will likely find this too hard for use on a hardwood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Brannon

customer_reviews.title: Going Great Nearly 3 Years In
customer_reviews.text: I've had this thing for almost 3 years now and I sleep comfortably. I sleep on my back and have no complaints in that position. If I sleep on my side its less comfy but that might be because I'm 220+lbs. Will update if I ever get down to 170 .-.
customer_reviews.author: Casillas

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this for my toddler to use. She's still a bit young to use it so I ended up sleeping on it. It is very comfortable and I actually prefer sleeping on this then my regular bed. I use it on the carpet so it's not that hard on your back. Not sure how it fares on hardwood floor. The thickness is as advertised. I've been sleeping on this for a month and the have not noticed any sagging in the cushion. Overall a great Japanese style mattress. I'm going to purchase another one for guest use.
customer_reviews.author: Chao ChaoTop Contributor: Amiibo

customer_reviews.title: One of the simplest but best mattresses
customer_reviews.text: We got this product for my son as a step up from his raggedy bed that was falling apart, and this is by far the best investment we've made. The mattress itself is light and very soft as well as easy to move when we have to switch things around. It can also be folded and stored when not in use leaving plenty of space to move around should the need arise. All in all a solid purchase, would definitely buy one of these again for another family member or even myself.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Vang

customer_reviews.title: Foldable, portable, decent price
customer_reviews.text: I have had this mattress for over two years now. I mostly use it for car camping. It folds up nicely and fits in the car rooftop case. I sleep comfortably on it. Its not going to feel like a super comfy five star hotel bed. You will feel the ground beneath you. It feels better on my back compared to an air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Zech S

customer_reviews.title: I love this futon
customer_reviews.text: I love this futon. I'm a college student and after having to sell a full size bed I bought last year after not being able to take it with me when moving house, I decided to go with this more portable mattress. This futon works perfectly for me and has improved my back as well. I can see myself using this even out of college.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent futon
customer_reviews.text: Amazing futon for floor sleeping! I bought a duvet cover to use as a futon cover. I’m considering buying another so I can double them when I want a really soft place to sleep but it might make it too soft and defeat the purpose. Don’t buy this expecting a mattress; it’s a futon. Anyone saying it’s a mattress topper must be looking at very different toppers than I am because it’s very thick and well made, unlike pretty much all toppers.
customer_reviews.author: PenguinKaty

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I really love my futon. It is very comfortable. I sleep with this directly on the floor. I cover my mattress with a zipped king size duvet to help the futon stay clean, and then I use a sheet over the duvet. The hardest part about having a queen size futon is putting it up on my dry rack to dry during the day. I usually dry my futon everyday. Normally, it takes me about 2-3 minutes to put the futon on the dry rack, nothing impossible, and still quite pragmatic to do.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Too thin for me, but made comfortable with a layer of memory foam.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a quality made product, but was not comfortable to me on its own (grass mat plus mattress) and the mattress has not expanded to the 3 inches advertised. I am 145 lbs., and I could feel the grass mat through the mattress. However, with a 3 inch memory foam mattress underneath it is quite comfortable so I’m keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Simple and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The package arrived sooner than I expected. It is exactly what I needed and it is very easy to store. I like that it was packaged in a vacuum sealed plastic bag so this will be beneficial for travel and storage. Despite its flat appearance it is surprisingly comfortable. There is a wonderful balance between firm and softness when set on the floor. Perfect for anyone looking to save space during the day and not sacrificing a good nights sleep. I have slept on different guest beds ranging from air mattresses to sofa pull-out bed over the years and this has been my favorite so far. I may be purchasing another in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Juan  Perez

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep ever
customer_reviews.text: I always used to sleep on a conventional mattress, but it kept causing my back and neck to hurt. I did some research and kept finding that traditional Japanese futons are supposedly good for the back and help with back pain. I was a bit skeptical, but decided to go for it because I couldn't deal with the other mattress any longer. I am so glad that I did. I have been using this futon for the past week and a half along with a traditional buckwheat hull makura pillow from Beans72, and I can say with confidence that I am sleeping better than I ever have, ever.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and well made
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and well made. I'm very happy I bought this mattress. I've slept on it on the floor. I'm thinking about getting a little extra padding to go under it but I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love this bed.
customer_reviews.text: I love this bed. It takes a little getting used to since it’s less cushion, but I get better sleep and it’s very comfortable. I don’t have a cover for the mattress specifically, so I put a fluffy comforter on top and just sleep on top of that. It also gives it a little but extra cushion. I get better sleep and I love that it takes up less room and you can fold it up if you want to. No downside. The tatami mat has a very grassy smell to it especially at first but I have come to actually like it! When I smell it it makes me feel like sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my back with a little extra egg crate pad on tops
customer_reviews.text: Love these mattresses. I use it on a platform bed with pegboard underneath it so it has a solid surface. I also add a thin egg crate pad on top to give it a little more cushion. I have serious back problems and these firm Japanese futon mattresses really make a big difference for me.
customer_reviews.author: woman

customer_reviews.title: best mattress ever
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny you spent on it. Sleep it better.
customer_reviews.author: Qin Huang

customer_reviews.title: Not what was advertised
customer_reviews.text: This was not what I ordered. It looks the same as the advertised image but the label it came with says “Mighty Top II by Teijim
customer_reviews.author: jennifer stollman

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I was worried, based on the reviews, if this would rise to 3". I don't think mine rose all the way to 3" but it is still so comfortable. I don't like sleeping on the floor... I normally sleep on a king size bed but I'm sleeping on the floor for my baby. We are both very comfortable with this set up.
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Jinnah

customer_reviews.title: Love my Futon
customer_reviews.text: There was so much research to do! But basically I love my new bed and I just put mine up on a loft and it's perfect and portable since I am staying temporarily with my parents during COVID. I intend to bring this home and enjoy it on my floor in my apartment. I use fullsized sheets on mine.
customer_reviews.author: Alana

customer_reviews.title: Best Traditional Japanese Fouton
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautifully crafted Japanese four in that stays true to the traditional style. I have had the pleasure of sleeping on this fouton for about a month now and I can honestly say it is the most comfortable, space-saving fouton out there. I would recommend buying one or two covers, as USA size twin zipper covers will not fit.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: I sleep on this every night after deciding to make a minimalistic switch. Can move it where and when you want, doesn't cause any pain and it can fit a regular twin sized bed sheet. Pad covers are expensive so I bought regular bed sheet protector covers and put one on both sides of it.
customer_reviews.author: Samimarie

customer_reviews.title: I am falling asleep and getting a good nights rest so far
customer_reviews.text: Futon mattress arrived as promised vacuumed sealed and compressed to about 2 inches in height. I followed directions from manufacturer and other posts for expected exspansion to 3 inches. Ive slept on it for about a month, using a low platform bed with wooden slats and a 2 inch coconut fiber mat under the Futon for extra padding. While it is definitely firm compared to traditional bed and mattress set up, I am falling asleep and getting a good nights rest so far.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: GreatQualityVitalForHammockSleepSystem
customer_reviews.text: Own 3x for famaly member Hammocks. Main part of Hammock sleep system for small chikdren with respiratory problems and seniors with bad circulation. Orientation 1pm-7pm or 2pm-8pm off ridgeline). Will not slip, provided great back support (allow time for creases to come out, with little tugs at corners). Back will get cold at 72°F and under, great insulator for temp comfort. Custom sheets available in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a comfortable surface to sleep on—would definitely need to be supplemented ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this item. Not a comfortable surface to sleep on—would definitely need to be supplemented with more padding than carpeting, and a rug, which we had. I wanted to like it but just couldn't.
customer_reviews.author: joni hayward

customer_reviews.title: Great quality J-futon!
customer_reviews.text: I like this light-weight shiki-futon and the recommended cotton-made cover. Great quality and cost performance. I initially bought this futon for a stay-over guest, but I wanted to give it a try. I put EMOOR on Ikea’s Sultan Timan Mattress Pad on the carpeted floor. I could sleep pretty comfortable. And, my dog loves this futon too :)
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this mattress if you hate waking up refreshed
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mattress! One of my favorite purchases of all time. Using a mattress so low to the ground which encourages back or stomach sleeping has really improved my sleep habits. My sleep quality has improved considerably, and I am very glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Obscure Name

customer_reviews.title: Grew mold
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these. The first one I bought is in good shape. The second one started growing mold faster then a cat after a mouse. I used everything I could to get rid of the mold but the material and the mold seem to be in love... I may have to dispose of the mattress and I have only had it for 3 months. The other one is fine and it is right next to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kuldeep

customer_reviews.title: Thinner than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I really like this despite the fact that it is thinner than claimed. However, for my wife it was too thin and caused her back to hurt so much that we ended up getting a different bed. I give three stars as a weight between my rating and my wife's rating.
customer_reviews.author: E. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good product, but I expected it to be a bit more cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: FrankMJ

customer_reviews.title: All that was promoted and more!!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffered neurological damage a few years ago. I use a cane and have limited range of motion/ strength. This futon was as described, quited pattern, light weight and yet very cushioned. I'm glad I purchased this futon. When I set up the guest bedroom, I will strongly consider purchasing another futon (this model) for that bed.
customer_reviews.author: John D Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Would like it to be a little thicker
customer_reviews.text: I've slept on it the past 2 nights and so far it's been better then the cott I was sleeping on. I was hoping it would have been a little thicker but ultimately I'm satisfied. I still feel like I'm able to sleep on my side or back without them aching in the morning. I've also woke up more rested then on the cott. I think after I add a little extra foam it'll be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: This thing is surprisingly comfortable. I have it set up on a carpeted ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is surprisingly comfortable. I have it set up on a carpeted room with nothing else below it, and it's comfortable enough for me to get a good nights sleep. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hale

customer_reviews.title: Good matteress but buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: very firm comes as advertised and just to let you know this is a NON REFUNDABLE ITEM so buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: T. Reasoner

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Ist what i needed. Im disable and everything hurts. Im sure lots can understand. All mattresses have failed me but this one i can eake up take my time do yoga on it. Only thing is its a little hard on my hips but nothing a thin pillow cant help. Looking forward to a better back/body/mind days. Wish i sould have bouth the package deal with the bkanket and pillow.
customer_reviews.author: veronica chang

customer_reviews.title: could be worse, but could be better
customer_reviews.text: The mattresses get dirty easily even with a blanket and sheet covering them, you kind of have to buy the 37 dollar cover for it. Also my boyfriend's mat has begun to fray and the stitching is coming out of it. pretty disappointed about that seeing as we have only had it for 8 months. He sleeps well on it, but i miss having an actual mattress. That being said it is definitely the best option for us in our tiny apartment that doesn't fit a full sized bed. easy to roll/fold up. only really draw back id the stitching coming undone.
customer_reviews.author: KV

customer_reviews.title: High quality Futon Mattress
customer_reviews.text: This Futon Mattress is great quality and exactly what I was looking for for my Full size bed. If you are not used to sleeping on a firm mattress, it may take a while to adjust. You can also put 1/2 inch foam mattress underneath for a little more cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it! Go buy a real mattress. I bought this, it was so bad i went and bought a real mattress and use this as a mattress topper
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Size, weight & practicality for a excellent price. We may even order another EmoorZ!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable packaging for us, a SENIOR couple, 77 & 75 years respectively. Totally easy to unload. The delivery was prompt. The futon is an essential product for our guests to be used on an existing queen size sofa couch/bed. No problem with the dimensions. It is exactly as advertised, and Amazon deserves the best of kudos!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent A. Pezzullo

customer_reviews.title: We have hard floors so I definitely needed extra padding like a mattress topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could sleep near my baby's crib for less disruptive night feedings. We have hard floors so I definitely needed extra padding like a mattress topper. I slept great for a new mom and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We are American but we have been looking for a shikibuton actually made in Japan by a Japanese company because the futons in the USA are not comfortable and supportive like the ones we had experienced in Japan. This is the closest we have come to find and we are in love with it! We have let friends sleep on it for a month and they have approved of it and said they slept well. We also brought it camping for a better experience in our tent and it was the best sleep. We love our shikibuton and are so grateful for this!
customer_reviews.author: Hector De Los Santos

customer_reviews.title: If you like sleeping on a floor!
customer_reviews.text: Much too thin to even call these a futon. Uncomfortable even for youngster weighing only 75 lbs. I've slept on a " real futon" before and found it comfortable but these are so thin a neighbor asked me if they were " yoga mats". Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Bevan C. Tulk

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sleeping on the floor
customer_reviews.text: The product came fast ascribed. I used this with additional foam underneath. It was very comfortable, and a perfect floor mattress for additional guests. I will consider buying from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: SMPath

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It is so much thinner than it looks in the picture. I'm familiar with floor mats from Asia and this one does not live up to the standards at all. Very disappointed for the amount spent.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Chang

customer_reviews.title: Well worth its price
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this mattress is superb. I can sleep on it comfortably on the floor with no other padding. It's also great for throwing in the back of my hatchback and car camping. It folds up easily for storage, too.
customer_reviews.author: Customer Since 1997

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for floor sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I'd been lying on stacked yoga mats, and this provided a much superior sleep. Good quality. Pity the carrying bag was not sold with it. It can be bought as a add on, however.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Nice futon, cover is a little small
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty nice futon. I use it on top of another futon and it is comfortable. The only complaint I have is the cover is a little small. Every time I wash the cover and put it back on I have to shake it out and smooth out the bumps so it lies flat. Seems like it could be easily fixed so it doesn’t do that.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie R.

customer_reviews.title: We love this floor mattress and it helps my Rheumatoid arthritis.
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our floor bed and for my rheumatoid arthritis and for me being on the floor and a firmer well made mattress helps me the most. I co sleep with my daughter also and this makes a great bed for that. I don’t think it would for everyone with rheumatoid arthritis but for me I need a very firm mattress plus I have always loved floor mattress better than traditional beds.
customer_reviews.author: Amberbariaktari

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and convenient.
customer_reviews.text: First day or so my body was getting accustomed to this way of sleeping. Since day I have been sleeping quite fine and comfortable. I highly recommend a cover and futon dryer if you’re not able to hang out to soak up the sun. Purchasing this bed has been the perfect way to move towards a more minimalistic lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lagares

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable as always.
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of Japanese futons, this is the largest one I've ever purchased. As always, super comfortable, good for the back, and (unlike what some of these reviews seem to be saying) I did not notice any stains or odd smells after opening it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Hind

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable traditional futon mattress !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Mattress came in a good shape. Everything was as explained in the product details. I love to sleep in a traditional futon mattress. This is a comfortable mattress for a good sleep. I am having a good quality sleep every night since I started using this mattress. This is a light mattress so you can easily carry while you are travelling as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a Dog Pound
customer_reviews.text: The mattress/tatami mat smells like a dog pound no matter how hard I try to fix it. It makes not only my room but my whole apartment smell very bad to the point where all my roommates complain about it. This is a bit ridiculous as I spent almost $300 on this mattress looking for a good nights sleep but now i have to get another mattress. This is a scam!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this. I used to sleep in a hammock ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I used to sleep in a hammock but I am unable to do so in my camper so I bought this mattress and it's great! No aches or pains, it's easy to move, zero complaints. I would however, suggest buying or using a non toxic plastic type mattress protector with this though, especially for anyone who may leak anything while sleeping.. you'll be sad about the stains
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I love sleeping on this one, it's comfortable and I like that it's not taking too much space in the room
customer_reviews.author: Offer Atzitz

customer_reviews.title: It works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little getting used too but I haven't had back pain since I got it. Maybe the first couple of days after moving for a queen foam mattress to this my hips were a little sore but I bought some memory foam from walmart to put underneath and that did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Surrago

customer_reviews.title: It is exactly as advertised and it is perfect. However
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as advertised and it is perfect. However, when I ordered it seems that I was ordering one that included a cover. Either it wasn't shipped with the cover or the ordering process was confusing. OTOH - it could've just been me!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic form!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected and wanted. The mat is stiff and without an igusa still maintains its form. The bed is wide enough for me and my partner to sleep on it and it is easy to fold. I have not cleaned it yet since the weather has been bleak, but with how surprisingly light it was I expect airing the futon will not be that difficult.
customer_reviews.author: BVE

customer_reviews.title: Great portable or Permanent location
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable perfect . I’m 5.7 and 150 pounds Fit well.. naps full sleeps .. feel good every time I use it..
customer_reviews.author: Luiz Louie

customer_reviews.title: This mattress make hard floor surface feels great for sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This mattress make hard floor surface feels great for sleeping. Is great for people that had back pain due to soft mattresses. If you are into firm surfaces that is confortable at the same time this is for you. I want to thank the people of japan as well as amazon for having this affordable mattress. Am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lew

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Came in a vacuum sealed bag. Opened bag in my Airstream Camper and all the alarms went off. Not sure what chemical or gas got released. This product feels very cheaply made not up to Japanese standards. I prefer down feather beds for comfort and all natural materials.
customer_reviews.author: Adam J. Marcello

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Japanese Quality
customer_reviews.text: You can tell that this is an authentic Japanese futon as the color starts off greenish before eventually fading into a yellow color. This is a natural process due to the plant that the futon is made of. Quality is great so far and the package came with a nice little thank you origami.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: It’s very firm (which I like) but super comfortable in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Got this to replace a bed that is older then I am and sinks down about a foot in the middle. It’s very firm (which I like) but super comfortable in my opinion. I love how I can fold it up and put it away during the day! Great for a studio apartment! If you like a super super firm bed this is a great choice. You can feel the floor through this so we put it on top of two thin quilts to soften it up a tiny bit.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a mattress topper. It is longer than my bed, but apart from that, I like it very much. Provides some cushioning. The futon is light in weight, so it is easy to lift and turn it.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable if you don't mind/like hard bed. Also gave my room so much space because I just told it up. The only thing missing is an traveling bag, but you can get one for around $25.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Bed For Everyday or Guests
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my adult son, 25. It arrived sooner than expected. He says it is very comfortable. He uses it as his regular bed. Since his bedroom is small, he can move it against the wall to create more our space during the day. He is over 6 ft tall and the length works for him.
customer_reviews.author: JBJ

customer_reviews.title: Way better than university furniture
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a replacement for the very uncomfortable beds in university housing. Well worth the price for comfort and the added benefit of being able to fold it to 1/3rd the size when not in use. I'm pretty sure this is the same as I had when I was staying over with my friend in Japan too, so it's as advertised: a typical Japanese Futon
customer_reviews.author: Pensa

customer_reviews.title: and this one is big enough to fit us and our daughter comfortably. It isn't thick enough by itself so we ...
customer_reviews.text: My Japanese husband wanted a futon after we moved to the U.S. and this one is big enough to fit us and our daughter comfortably. It isn't thick enough by itself so we use a foam mattress supporter underneath it and it's become very comfortable. It is large though, I use non-fitted sheets on top and it's tough to clean by yourself. Mostly I am happy that there was a seller who would ship this to us where we are located! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This futon is exactly what I needed. My mattress is too hard. I put this futon on top. Now my bed is very is very comfortable! It arrived on time, and was packaged compact. Save the plastic zipper bag it arrives in, for storage purposes! Excellent futon. I am very happy.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter because of her back pain. It works best on the hard floor. Said it was helping with her back pain
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: In fact the thickness is more like 4cm, which is the half of 8cm on ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes I was looking for a shikifuton, but what a surprise, the thickness is barely 2 inches. Other reviewers were right. In fact the thickness is more like 4cm, which is the half of 8cm on product description. I think the seller needs to correct this error. It's not going to be 8cm even if you expose the futon to sun. This kind of slim futon is called "senbei buton" in Japan. Senbei means a hard snack. So... it sure is an imported product, but I feel it's well overpriced. You can find this kind of quality below 60 dollars in Japan!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So hard!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this since November 2018 and it is now Jan 21, 19. If you enjoy sleeping on a very hard surface, this is for you. I’ve had to add 4 in of foam on top.
customer_reviews.author: shopper

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my futon mattress for about two months now and l absolutely love it! It took me a couple weeks to get accustomed to sleeping on a futon as oppose to a regular mattress, as expected. But now, I can't wait to crawl into bed on my futon!
customer_reviews.author: Railsha

customer_reviews.title: this thing is very thin
customer_reviews.text: In the picture, it seems fluffy but It is not fluffy at all. it is very thin, maybe maximum 2 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Aidin

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I combined this with 2" of latex foam ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I combined this with 2" of latex foam to make a mattress for the daybed we replaced our couch with.
customer_reviews.author: A. Landreau

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Air Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: After staying in Japan for a vacation, I needed to get one of these Futons for myself. It is relatively portable, and is a great alternative to an Air Mattress. To me at least, it is comparable in comfort to my actual bed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This mattress arrived in vacuumed plastic bag for ease of ...
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed this mattress very much. My sleep has never been better. This mattress arrived in vacuumed plastic bag for ease of storage. The packaging is very thoughtful. I followed the detailed instruction, aired the mattress out for a few hours. I am familiar with thin futon mattress, this product is exactly what I have been look for. If you are not used to sleep on hard tatami then you might find it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: linlin tian

customer_reviews.title: Great for those of us that like a firm mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I've been sleeping on this mattress for a couple of months, and after an initial few days of getting used to sleeping on the floor, I find it to be very comfortable. I sleep better on it than I did on a regular mattress. That being said, if you want it soft and cushy, this mattress is not for you, but if you like a firm sleeping surface you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Bowen

product_meta.title: EMOOR Japanese Traditional Futon Mattress Classe (39 x 83 x 2.5 in.), Twin-Long Size, Made in Japan
feature_bullets: "Classe" is EMOOR's best and long selling, simple and basic futon series. Have a good sleep with our good quality, Made-in-Japan futon at reasonable price.
Mattress Futon is about 2.5in (8cm) thick, contains a firm polyester pad sandwiched with soft filling. Firm but not too hard. Good for your back
100% Cotton is used for outer fabric.
Dimensions: Japanese Twin-long Size 39 x 83in (100 x 210cm) How to care: Non-washable. We recommend to use cover and wash cover only when it gets dirty. You may find covers with the ASIN: B00KF88EJG

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars745 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
